item.battle_arts.origin_excalibur.toolti: This relic was once wielded by one of the 10 legendary heroes. It is said that all Excaliburs are based off this original template.
item.battle_arts.origin_joyeuse.tooltip:
Flames that should not be handled but only by a true wielder.
All human variants of Joyeuse are derived from this one, be it holy or demonic.
All said is nothing compared to the almighty Flare Blade.

Temperatures can reach 10 to the power of 32 degrees Kelvin.
skill.battle_arts.hero.tooltip: The one with the sword and shield, increased attack speed with swords and axes. Reduced attack speed with everything else.
skill.battle_arts.imperatrice_lumiere.to:
The legendary battle style of the Eternal Emberlight Empress. Uses primarily swords.

"Hey, learning House Flaron's sword style is a massive responsibility! Good luck!"
skill.battle_arts.precision_vertical.too: Throw your chakram forward with devastating range in a precise area in front of you.
skill.battle_arts.demon.tooltip: A wielder of the demonic blade Satsujin. Increases attack speed but reduces health and defense.
skill.battle_arts.atlantean.tooltip: The hero of the deep sea imparts knowledge of the attacks that is exclusive to the obsidian blade Herrscher and the nautilus shield Gesetz
skill.battle_arts.blaze_stinger.tooltip: Smash attacks can be directionally inputted for different animations or results.
skill.battle_arts.trailblaze.tooltip:
Required Battle Style: Impératrice Lumiére

Dash a fair distance in any direction, primarily used to follow up on the mostly stationary comboes of Impératrice Lumiére
skill.battle_arts.flare_burst.tooltip:
Required Battle Style: Impératrice Lumiére

Go into overdrive, gaining increased attack damage and stun immunity. Slowly damages your common weapons that you wield. Allows the use of the Impératrice Lumiére's Ultimate Art Set
skill.battle_arts.imperatrice_ultimate.t:
Required Battle Style: Impératrice Lumiére

Specified Weapon: Origin Joyeuse or Derived Joyeuse

Casts three different ultimate arts based if you have the correct weapons or not.
origin.origins.blazeborn.description: The Flarian/Cosmonian hybrid that is the fabled Impératrice Lumiére. Immune to Fire.
skill.battle_arts.test_combat_art.toolti: This art is meant to be tested and not actually used in game.
text.battle_arts.item_melt: Your item melted due to overwhelming heat.
text.battle_arts.item_burn: Your wooden item burned away from overwhelming heat.
text.battle_arts.item_melting_netherite: Your netherite item is melting due to overwhelming heat despite being fire resistant.
text.battle_arts.item_melt_solar: Solar melted due from overwhelming heat.
